destination.tooltip_region: Shows as purple lines when you press F11. This is the region from which we generate the adjacency regions. It should fit all of your entity in a neat square.
destination.tooltip_region_max: Back Right Corner with y set to height desired for walking up to it (usually y=1)
destination.tooltip_adjacency: Shows as red lines when you press F11. This is where a hearthling where try to walk to when they walk up to the entity. Click on a square to set it as considered adjacent to the object or not.
